column4: Does anyone know of a good (stable release) music player for GTK? I'm using VLC right now, but I'd like something a little.. nicer to play my M4A archives.
riotkittie: xmms is gtk+, not gtk2. You could try beep-media-player or bmpx.
Of course. Amarok is a high-class music player. It won't play your trash.
